slogan.titleLine2: We're more eager than you are.
slogan.description: EatHub is a food recommendation platform designed specifically for those with choice paralysis. Based on your taste preferences and location, quickly filter out food options that are exclusively yours!

home.title: Feature Introduction
home.description: Explore the powerful features EatHub has prepared for you

feature1.title: Smart Local Food Recommendations
feature1.description: Integrating Google Map API and Open AI's API for smart recommendations, allowing users to easily find suitable local cuisine!

feature2.title: Favorite and Restaurant Browsing Records
feature2.description: Users can collect and record browsed recommended restaurants, no need to worry about what to eat next, curing your choice paralysis!

feature3.title: Restaurant Navigation and Review Sharing
feature3.description: Through one-click navigation, you can directly navigate to enjoy food, while leaving reviews to record and share your food experiences!

feature4.title: Merchant Updates and Promotional Marketing
feature4.description: Providing a backend for merchants to upload coupons and merchant updates, bringing integrated marketing effectiveness and attracting customer numbers.

sections.introductionContent: EatHub is a non-commercial learning project aimed at providing interactive experiences similar to social and dining recommendation platforms through implementation and demonstration of website functions. This website is not an official commercial platform, and all content is for learning demonstration and informal reference only.
sections.eligibilityContent: This website does not restrict minor registration. If you are under 13 years old, it is recommended to use under parental or guardian supervision.
sections.privacyCollected: This website collects the following personal data:
sections.privacyUsage: Collected data is only used for the following purposes:

privacyPurposes.service: Provide customized services (such as comments, favorites, coupons, etc.)
privacyPurposes.optimize: Optimize website experience and function demonstration

sections.privacyNote: Your data will not be used for commercial marketing, nor will it be provided to third parties, unless necessary to implement website functions (such as necessary data exchange during third-party API integration).
sections.contentLicenseContent: Reviews, photos and other content uploaded by users on this website are deemed to authorize the EatHub team to use within the scope of demonstration, research and non-profit public use.

prohibitedItems.illegal: Publishing illegal, obscene, defamatory or false information
prohibitedItems.unauthorized: Uploading unauthorized portrait or copyrighted content
prohibitedItems.attack: Attempting to hack, interfere with website operation or other user accounts

sections.thirdPartyContent: This website integrates third-party services such as Google Place API, Cloudinary and OpenAI. The content and stability of the above services are beyond our control. Please pay attention to their respective terms of service and privacy policies when using.
sections.disclaimerContent: EatHub is for educational demonstration purposes and does not guarantee the timeliness and accuracy of information. All recommendation information and reviews are for reference only and do not represent the actual merchant or partnership position.
sections.updateContent: This website reserves the right to modify the terms of service. Terms updates will be announced on this page, please check from time to time.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: Welcome to use the various services provided by "EatHub" (hereinafter referred to as "this website" or "we"). To protect your personal data and privacy, we have formulated this "Privacy Policy" in accordance with relevant regulations. Please read the following content carefully.

section1List.registration: Registration information: such as name, email, username, password, etc.
section1List.usage: Usage records: such as pages you browse, search keywords, restaurants you click on and favorite behaviors.
section1List.interaction: Interactive content: such as reviews, comments, uploaded images and other content you actively input.
section1List.device: Device information: We only use cookies to record login status. We do not actively record or store your IP location, browser type or device information.

section2List.authentication: Verify your identity and provide account-related services
section2List.recommendation: Optimize recommendation algorithms to provide restaurant information that matches your preferences
section2List.support: Handle questions, suggestions or service requests you raise
section2List.notification: Send service updates, marketing activities or important notifications (you can choose to unsubscribe)
section2List.compliance: Comply with legal obligations or requirements from competent authorities

privacyPolicy.section3Description: This website uses Cookie technology to record login status and improve user experience. Authentication credentials (tokens) after login will be stored in cookies for identity recognition purposes. You can limit or disable cookies through browser settings, but this may cause some functions to not work properly.
privacyPolicy.section4Description1: This website provides Google third-party login functionality. When you use this login method, Google will provide your authorized personal data (such as name and email), and we will only use this information to create accounts and perform identity verification.
privacyPolicy.section4Description2: We will not share your usage behavior on the website with Google or other third parties, nor will we use it for marketing or other purposes. In addition, this website does not use website tracking analysis tools such as Google Analytics or Hotjar.

section5List.access: Query or view your personal data
section5List.correction: Request correction or deletion of incorrect data
section5List.withdrawal: Withdraw consent and stop data use (may cause some functions to be unavailable)

privacyPolicy.section5Note: If you need to exercise the above rights, please contact us through customer service email, and we will handle it within a reasonable time.
privacyPolicy.section6Description1: We are committed to protecting the security of your personal data and take measures including but not limited to the following:

section6List.encryption: Passwords are encrypted and stored, not retained in plain text
section6List.access: Only authorized personnel can access data
section6List.deletion: Regularly clear data that is no longer used or expired

privacyPolicy.section6Description2: The retention period of data depends on its purpose of use and does not exceed the maximum period allowed by law.
privacyPolicy.section7Description: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Any changes will be announced on this website and marked with the update date. If you continue to use this website after the terms change, it is deemed that you have agreed to the new content.
